allow: Bash(for f in templates/change_password.html templates/credentials.html templates/dashboard.html templates/guests.html templates/guest_detail.html templates/hosts.html templates/mastodon.html templates/schedules.html templates/settings.html templates/terminal.html templates/users.html templates/unifi.html)
